title: Study Stress
verses: 2 Timothy 2:15 (WEB) — “Give diligence… properly handling the word of truth.”
Colossians 3:23 (WEB) — “Work heartily, as for the Lord.”
James 1:5 (WEB) — “Ask of God… and it will be given.”
body: Study is worship when offered to God. Plan your time, take small breaks, and ask for wisdom. Effort is yours; outcomes are in His hands.
prayer: Teacher and Lord, order my mind and time. Give me focus, understanding, and peace as I study to honor You. Amen.
